text: "Just Around The Hill" is a 2000 song by the German DJ group Sash! and it features English singer Tina Cousins. It is the second single from Sash's third studio album Trilenium which was released on 22 May 2000. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2000) Peak position Czech Republic (IFPI) 9 Denmark (IFPI)Danish Singles Chart. 31 March 2000. 16 Iceland (√çslenski Listinn Topp 40) 24 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40 Tipparade) 9 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 5 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2000) Position Romania (Romanian Top 100) 52 ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Sash! songs
title: Just Around the Hill
